metadata.title: CVE-2017-15601 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is a heap-based buffer overflow in theEXTRACTOR_png_extract_method function in plugins/png_extractor.c, relatedto processiTXt and stndup.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.6-2
libextractor3 - 1:1.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libextractor package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.6-2').
